WorkItem.Description:
Many apologies if im missing something blindingly obvious, but im getting inflated stats when importing into RAWR, despite having no buffs at all when logging out. 
 
For example I actually have 5271AP unbuffed. When first importing into rawr from the armory it gives me 9596. After disabling all buffs i still have 7369. 
 
Crit, spell power, agility are also affected.
 
Armory link http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Thunderhorn&cn=Dagnabbit
 
Unbuffed xml file attached.
WorkItem.Summary: [Enhance] Incorrect stat values when importing from Armory

Comments.Message: Not a bug. Special effects are included in Rawr's calculations, and not in the Armory or in-game character screen.
